meanings.definition: The practice of touring natural habitats in a way that conserves the environment and improves the well-being of local people.
meanings.sent1: Many people enjoy ecotourisms to see animals in their natural homes.
meanings.sent2: Ecotourisms can help protect wildlife and support communities.
meanings.sent3: During ecotourisms, visitors learn about nature while helping the environment.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the rainforest through ecotourisms is like stepping into a living, breathing textbook.
meanings.sent5: Ecotourisms offer a unique way to experience nature responsibly.

meanings.definition: The business of organizing vacations to natural areas with the goal of minimizing impact on the environment.
meanings.sent1: The ecotourisms industry is growing as more people seek sustainable travel options.
meanings.sent2: Companies in ecotourisms focus on eco-friendly practices and conservation efforts.
meanings.sent3: In the world of ecotourisms, protecting nature is just as important as profit.
meanings.sent4: The success of ecotourisms relies on balancing tourism with environmental preservation.
meanings.sent5: Ecotourisms businesses play a crucial role in promoting environmental awareness.
